bugs.title: Adopt the ppc64le patches from OpenPOWER patchset

bugzilla.short_desc: Adopt the ppc64le patches from OpenPOWER patchset

long_desc.thetext:
To Than Ngo and other maintainers of Chromium pckage

Firstly I would like to express my gratitude for your effort in support the PowerPC64LE.

Recently Timothy Pearson <tpearson@solidsilicon.com> (the Debian maintainer of Chromium) has brought up the idea of having a patchset for the software that would lower the maintenance for packagers.

The patchset is currently being hosted in

https://gitlab.solidsilicon.io/public-development/open-source/chromium/openpower-patches

I would like to propose that Fedora project to adopt the patchset.

Lastly Tim has set up a monthly meeting between OpenPOWER community members to keep the patchset up to date with the upcoming Chromium releases. The meeting is open for all who are interested, so pelase don't hesitate to get in touch with Tim.

Now coming back to

Reproducible: Always
